verses.verse: Now the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> [were] four: <WH702> Tola, <WH8439> Puah, <WH6312> Jashub, <WH3437> and Shimron. <WH9616>

And the sons <WH1121> of Tola <WH8439> [were] Uzzi, <WH5813> Rephaiah, <WH7509> Jeriel, <WH3400> Jahmai, <WH3181> Ibsam, <WH3005> and Samuel, <WH8050> heads <WH7218> of their fathers' households. <WH1004> [The sons] of Tola <WH8439> [were] mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of valor <WH2428> in their generations; <WH8435> their number <WH4557> in the days <WH3117> of David <WH1732> was 22600.

And the son <WH1121> of Uzzi <WH5813> [was] Izrahiah. <WH3156> And the sons <WH1121> of Izrahiah <WH3156> [were] Michael, <WH4317> Obadiah, <WH5662> Joel, <WH3100> Isshiah; <WH3449> all <WH3605> five <WH2568> of them [were] chief <WH7218> men. <WH7218>

And with them by their generations <WH8435> according to their fathers' households <WH1004> were 36000 troops <WH1416> of the army <WH6635> for war, <WH4421> for they had <WH7235> many <WH7235> wives <WH802> and sons. <WH1121>

And their relatives <WH251> among all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of Issachar <WH3485> [were] mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> enrolled <WH3187> by genealogy, <WH3187> in all <WH3605> 87000.
[The sons of] Benjamin <WH1144> [were] three: <WH7969> Bela <WH1106> and Becher <WH1071> and Jediael. <WH3043>

And the sons <WH1121> of Bela <WH1106> were five: <WH2568> Ezbon, <WH675> Uzzi, <WH5813> Uzziel, <WH5816> Jerimoth, <WH3406> and Iri. <WH5901> They [were] heads <WH7218> of fathers' households, <WH1004> mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and were 22034 enrolled <WH3187> by genealogy. <WH3187>

And the sons <WH1121> of Becher <WH1071> [were] Zemirah, <WH2160> Joash, <WH3135> Eliezer, <WH461> Elioenai, <WH454> Omri, <WH6018> Jeremoth, <WH3406> Abijah, <WH29> Anathoth, <WH6068> and Alemeth. <WH5964> All <WH3605> these <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Becher. <WH1071>

And they were enrolled <WH3187> by genealogy, <WH3187> according to their generations, <WH8435> heads <WH7218> of their fathers' households, <WH1004> 20200 mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of valor. <WH2428>

And the son <WH1121> of Jediael <WH3043> [was] Bilhan. <WH1092> And the sons <WH1121> of Bilhan <WH1092> [were] Jeush, <WH3266> Benjamin, <WH1144> Ehud, <WH164> Chenaanah, <WH3668> Zethan, <WH2133> Tarshish, <WH8659> and Ahishahar. <WH300>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> [were] sons <WH1121> of Jediael, <WH3043> according to the heads <WH7218> of their fathers' households, 17200 mighty <WH1> men <WH1368> of valor, <WH1368> who were ready to go <WH2428> out with the army <WH3318> to war. <WH6635>
And Shuppim <WH8206> and Huppim <WH2650> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Ir; <WH5893> Hushim <WH9127> [was] the son <WH1121> of Aher. <WH313>
The sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> [were] Jahziel, <WH3185> Guni, <WH1476> Jezer, <WH3337> and Shallum, <WH7967> the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah. <WH1090>
The sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> [were] Asriel, <WH844> whom <WH834> his Aramean <WH761> concubine <WH6370> bore; <WH3205> she bore <WH3205> Machir <WH4353> the father of Gilead. <WH1>

And Machir <WH4353> took <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for Huppim <WH2650> and Shuppim, <WH8206> whose sister's name <WH8034> was Maacah. <WH4601> And the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> was Zelophehad, <WH6765> and Zelophehad <WH6765> had <WH1961> daughters. <WH1323>

And Maacah <WH4601> the wife <WH802> of Machir <WH4353> bore <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and she named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Peresh; <WH6570> and the name <WH8034> of his brother <WH251> [was] Sheresh, <WH8329> and his sons <WH1121> [were] Ulam <WH198> and Rakem. <WH7552>
And the son <WH1121> of Ulam <WH198> [was] Bedan. <WH917> These <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh. <WH4519>
And his sister <WH269> Hammolecheth <WH4447> bore <WH3205> Ishhod <WH379> and Abiezer <WH44> and Mahlah. <WH4244>
And the sons <WH1121> of Shemida <WH8061> were Ahian <WH291> and Shechem <WH7928> and Likhi <WH3949> and Aniam. <WH593>

And the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> [were] Shuthelah <WH7803> and Bered <WH1260> his son, <WH1121> Tahath <WH8480> his son, <WH1121> Eleadah <WH497> his son, <WH1121> Tahath <WH8480> his son, <WH1121>

Zabad <WH2066> his son, <WH1121> Shuthelah <WH7803> his son, <WH1121> and Ezer <WH5827> and Elead <WH496> whom the men <WH376> of Gath <WH1661> who were born <WH3205> in the land <WH776> killed, <WH2026> because <WH3588> they came <WH3381> down <WH3381> to take <WH3947> their livestock. <WH4735>
And their father Ephraim <WH1> mourned <WH669> many <WH56> days, <WH7227> and his relatives <WH3117> came <WH251> to comfort <WH935> him.

Then he went <WH935> in to his wife, <WH802> and she conceived <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and he named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Beriah, <WH1283> because <WH3588> misfortune <WH9567> had come <WH1961> upon his house. <WH1004>
And his daughter <WH1323> was Sheerah, <WH7609> who built <WH1129> lower <WH8481> and upper <WH5945> Beth-horon, also Uzzen-sheerah.
And Rephah <WH7506> was his son <WH1121> [along] with Resheph, <WH7566> Telah <WH8520> his son, <WH1121> Tahan <WH8465> his son, <WH1121>
Ladan <WH3936> his son, <WH1121> Ammihud <WH5989> his son, <WH1121> Elishama <WH476> his son, <WH1121>
Non <WH5126> his son, <WH1121> and Joshua <WH3091> his son. <WH1121>

And their possessions <WH272> and settlements <WH4186> [were] Bethel <WH1008> with its towns, <WH1323> and to the east <WH4217> Naaran, <WH5295> and to the west <WH4628> Gezer <WH1507> with its towns, <WH1323> and Shechem <WH7927> with its towns <WH1323> as far <WH5704> as Ayyah <WH5857> with its towns, <WH1323>

and along <WH5921> the borders <WH3027> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> Beth-shean with its towns, <WH1323> Taanach <WH8590> with its towns, <WH1323> Megiddo <WH4023> with its towns, <WH1323> Dor <WH1756> with its towns. <WH1323> In these <WH428> lived <WH3427> the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> the son <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
The sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> [were] Imnah, <WH3232> Ishvah, <WH3438> Ishvi <WH3440> and Beriah, <WH1283> and Serah <WH8294> their sister. <WH269>
And the sons <WH1121> of Beriah <WH1283> [were] Heber <WH2268> and Malchiel, <WH4439> who <WH1931> was the father of Birzaith. <WH1>
And Heber <WH2268> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Japhlet, <WH3310> Shomer <WH7763> and Hotham, <WH2369> and Shua <WH7774> their sister. <WH269>
And the sons <WH1121> of Japhlet <WH3310> [were] Pasach, <WH6457> Bimhal, <WH1118> and Ashvath. <WH6220> These <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Japhlet. <WH3310>
And the sons <WH1121> of Shemer <WH8106> [were] Ahi <WH277> and Rohgah, <WH7303> Jehubbah <WH3160> and Aram. <WH758>
And the sons <WH1121> of his brother <WH251> Helem <WH1987> [were] Zophah, <WH6690> Imna, <WH3234> Shelesh, <WH8028> and Amal. <WH6000>
The sons <WH1121> of Zophah <WH6690> [were] Suah, <WH5477> Harnepher, <WH2774> Shual, <WH9594> Beri, <WH1275> and Imrah, <WH3236>
Bezer, <WH1221> Hod, <WH1936> Shamma, <WH8037> Shilshah, <WH8030> Ithran, <WH3506> and Beera. <WH878>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jether <WH3500> [were] Jephunneh, <WH3312> Pispa, <WH6462> and Ara. <WH690>
And the sons <WH1121> of Ulla <WH5925> [were] Arah, <WH733> Hanniel, <WH2592> and Rizia. <WH7525>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Asher, <WH836> heads <WH7218> of the fathers' houses, <WH1004> choice <WH1305> and mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> heads <WH7218> of the princes. <WH5387> And the number <WH4557> of them enrolled <WH3187> by genealogy <WH3187> for service <WH6635> in war <WH4421> was 26000 men. <WH376>
